Uses of Package
fil.sr1.implementation

Packages that use fil.sr1.implementation
Package Description
fil.sr1.commandhandler
Contains the logic allowing us to associate the commands sent by the client to their respective logic/to their handler
fil.sr1.commandhandler.commands
Contains all the implementations and logic related to the command received by the FTP server, one class equals one command
fil.sr1.implementation
Contains all the implementation/logics linked to the proper functioning of the FTP server.
  • Classes in fil.sr1.implementation used by fil.sr1.commandhandler
    Class Description
    ClientFtp
    Class which characterizes the session with a client and allows the command exchange between the client and server.
  • Classes in fil.sr1.implementation used by fil.sr1.commandhandler.commands
    Class Description
    ClientFtp
    Class which characterizes the session with a client and allows the command exchange between the client and server.
  • Classes in fil.sr1.implementation used by fil.sr1.implementation
    Class Description
    DataSocket
    Class which characterizes the data channel with a client and allows data exchange between the client and server.
    ServerFtp
    Singleton class which creates a serverSocket on a specific port waits for connections as long as it is not closed
    User
    The purpose of this class is to manage all the statuses of users trying to connect to the server.
